sentences.en: Because of their general circulatory nature, these are referred to as eddy currents.

sentences.en: Method From January 1999 to August 2005,26 patients received mechanical circulatory support.

sentences.en: The cause of dyspnea may be pulmonary disease, circulatory disease, or both.
sentences.cn: 呼吸困难的原因可能是肺部疾病, 循环系统疾病或者两者并存.
